engine.space

Class QuadTree<T extends ISpatialObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.space.QuadTree<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpatialStructure<T>

    public class QuadTree<T extends ISpatialObject>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpatialStructure<T>
    Represents a 2D space that can be recursively divided into 4 equal subspaces.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuadTree

        public QuadTree(AABB aabb,
        int capacity)
        Initializes a QuadTree from an AABB.
        Parameters:
        aabb - Represents the 2D space inside the QuadTree.
        capacity - The number of objects that can be added to the QuadTree before it subdivides.
